sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function Calculator() { const [result, setResult] = useState("0"); const handleClick = e => { let value = e.target.innerText; switch (value) { case "C": setResult("0"); break; case "<": setResult(result.slice(0, -1)); break; case "+": case "-": case "*": case "/": setResult(result + value); break; case "=": setResult(eval(result)); break; default: if (result === "0") { setResult(value); } else { setResult(result + value); } break; } }; return (
{result}
) } export default Calculator;
